mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(nickname, email, password, signUpType) VALUES (#{nickname}, #{email}, #{password}, #{signUpType})
mapper.select: SELECT id, nickname, email, signUpType, FORMATDATETIME(signUpDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as signUpDate FROM users order by id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE email = #{email}
